extendedInfo.description: All joking aside, this time you will understand how electronic circuits work."I stumbled upon some serious gold" - GeekBeat.tv"This app takes design to a whole new level of interactivity" - Design NewsBuild any circuit, tap play button, and watch dynamic voltage, current, and charge animations. This gives you insight into circuit operation like no equation does. While simulation is running, adjust circuit parameters with analog knob, and the circuit responds to your actions in real time. You can even generate an arbitrary input signal with your finger!That's interactivity and innovation you can't find in best SPICE tools for PC like Multisim, LTspice, OrCad or PSpice (trademarks belong to their respective owners).EveryCircuit is not just an eye candy. Under the hood it packs custom-built simulation engine optimized for interactive mobile use, serious numerical methods, and realistic device models. In short, Ohm's law, Kirchhoff's current and voltage laws, nonlinear semiconductor device equations, and all the good stuff is there.Growing library of components gives you freedom to design any analog or digital circuit from a simple voltage divider to transistor-level masterpiece.Schematic editor features automatic wire routing, and minimalistic user interface. No nonsense, less tapping, more productivity.Simplicity, innovation, and power, combined with mobility, make EveryCircuit a must-have companion for high school science and physics students, electrical engineering college students, breadboard and printed circuit board (PCB) enthusiasts, and ham radio hobbyists.Free version has limited sandbox area, but it can still impress you. If you need a larger playground, a full version is available. The full version will employ all of your imagination, and all the screen area of your tablet.Thanks to Prof. N. Maghari for technical discussions, feedback, and help with designing circuit examples.Features:+ Animations of voltage waveforms and current flows+ Animations of capacitor charges+ Analog control knob adjusts circuit parameters+ Automatic wire routing+ Oscilloscope+ Seamless DC and transient simulation+ Single play/pause button controls simulation+ Saving and loading of circuit schematic+ Mobile simulation engine built from ground-up+ Shake the phone to kick-start oscillators+ Intuitive user interface+ No AdsComponents:+ Sources, signal generators+ Controlled sources (VCVS, VCCS)+ Resistors, capacitors, inductors, transformers+ Potentiometer, lamp+ Switches, SPST, SPDT+ Diodes, Zener diodes, light emitting diodes (LED)+ MOS transistors (MOSFET)+ Bipolar junction transistors (BJT)+ Ideal operational amplifier (opamp)+ Digital logic gates, AND, OR, NOT, NAND, NOR, XOR, XNORNext:+ More componentsIf you like it, please rate, review, and buy!

reviews.title: Great idea and really nice job
reviews.comment: There are however still some improvements to make. For example LC oscillator when discharged and time base changed starts to load itself :-)  However, I\'m impressed.
reviews.author: Micha\305\202 Czapski

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It is the first app that impressed me so much that I wanted to rate it. It has an awesome(yet simple) UI. However, it\'s only handy for small calculations or educational purposes (since you have quite a limited space)
reviews.author: Ionut Pop

reviews.title: 2nd Order Circuit Response is Failing at small precisions
reviews.comment: If you are a electrical engineering student and you are trying to see how a parallel or a series RLC circuit behaves, you shoud try another solution. This app don\'t have good models of the components. As we say in portuguese, n\303\243o amarra as chuteiras do orCad.
reviews.author: Arthur Farias

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Can you give free for large circuit. I am amazing with this app. Thank you very much.
reviews.author: deva raj

reviews.title: Shows only ideal behaviour... :-(
reviews.comment: All the circuit elements show ideal behaviour...  Like for example if you increase the reverse voltage in the case of a diode to whatever value you want, it still shows zero current....  If that\'s taken care of, I would give it five...  Please look into it....
reviews.author: Advaith R.Shesh

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It\'s an awesome simulator app. It has a nice look. It has some problem with op-amp ckts which simulated with error in this update.Please provide some extra space for the ckts and also plz add extra components.
reviews.author: Sheshadri. V

reviews.title: Very impressive
reviews.comment: Needed something simple to simulate circuits for labs and lab reports. Pspice and multisim are great but are bloated and take too long to use. Will definitely upgrade to full version
reviews.author: Imran Mumtaz

reviews.title: Exellent app
reviews.comment: Very usefull app for me as a electronic enginering student
reviews.author: heshan deeyagaha

reviews.title: No help or tutorial?
reviews.comment: I had to bring this down to one star.  As an app for designing circuitry if you already know what you\'re doing, this would be great.  However, the description speaks of this app as not just a design tool but a teaching tool.  And the examples given do not give much insight into what\'s going on. It\'s frustrating because the description pretty much says you will understand electronic circuitry... In fact, that\'s the first thing the description says....
reviews.author: John Meise

reviews.title: Free version is useless
reviews.comment: Almost any simple circuit is a large one in terms of this program and is not allowed in the free version.
reviews.author: Mikhail Nikolaenko

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good program for Electrical Engineers
reviews.author: Manuel Ubau

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: good
reviews.author: Jai Ganesh

reviews.title: Pointless can\'t do anything
reviews.comment: Every button you press seems to take you to the \'pay for full app\' screen. Useless as a demo. Can\'t test anything.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very useful

reviews.title: Really great work...
reviews.comment: Im working as asst. Prof teaching electrical subs which will be very useful to teach my student..this is the 1st app im reviewing...I will promote this app on behalf of u...

reviews.comment: You can\'t build anything useful to try out this. Very sad

reviews.comment: Do you have upgrade plans on the full version to allow a larger work area? I see this as s deal breaker! Keep it up, real nice tool.
